CustomField.description: This field visually designates if the first touch SLA was met. If the SLA has not passed, this time value is in total hours, not Business Hours.
CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(tysosla__First_Touch_Due__c), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/warning16.png", "Orange")&" Not Enough Info",
IF(tysosla__First_Touch_Violation__c, IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.png", "Red"), IF (tysosla__First_Touch_Violation__c==false, IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm16.png", "Green"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01570000000Q6Ep", "Red")))
&
IF(AND(tysosla__First_Touch_Violation__c==false, tysosla__First_Touch_Due__c >NOW()), " Due in: "&
TEXT( ROUND(MOD((tysosla__First_Touch_Due__c-NOW())*24,24),0) ) &" Hr " & TEXT( ROUND(MOD((tysosla__First_Touch_Due__c-NOW())*1440,60),0) ) &" Min " , null)
& IF(tysosla__First_Touch_Violation__c, " Missed SLA", "") & IF(AND(tysosla__First_Touch_Violation__c==false, tysosla__First_Touch_Due__c<NOW()), " Met SLA", "")
)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field visually designates if the first touch SLA was met. If the SLA has not passed, this time value is in total hours, not Business Hours.
CustomField.label: SLA Status
